Package main.java.it.unipr.model

Class Race

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.model.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Race extends Object implements Serializable
The class Race provides an implementation of a model of a race.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

      public Race(int id, String name, String place, Date date, int boatsNumber, float registrationFee, Date endDateRegistration, StatusCode statusCode)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the race.
      name - the name of the race.
      place - the place of the race.
      date - the date of the race.
      boatsNumber - the number of boats participating in the race.
      registrationFee - the registration fee for the race.
      endDateRegistration - the end date of registration of a boat at the race.
      statusCode - the status code of the race.
